content.detailedDescription: I just got out of my car to go inside for work, there were 5-6 basketball size glowing orbs heading a north westward direction. my feelings are that i am becoming more and more upset because i know i am an abductee, i have the scoop marks, my blood type rh negative. i moved back from huntington beach ca. and they have found me again. i didn't even want to report this, it has been 7 months, but my intuition tells me they are coming for me again!!!
content.summary: Going to work and they were watching me, i have been taken several times, but not this time?

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling home from a friend. my stepdad droves me und i saw at the sky. 

about at 8 p.M. i saw the lights. i say to my stepdad, that he should take a look in the sky. he saw the lights also. at this point i know that was ufo's. they are look like disc's. they radiated yellow/red lights of. at the first them they have an triangle order but against 3 seconds the haven't any order. the lights were flying around the sky and had an enormous speed. they are so fast, faster then any airplane. in our city we have an military airport, but i know those planes they have and this objects were much faster then our planes. i watched this event about 1 our, then the lights make a fast move and been away. 

2 day's later i was again by my friend and i tell him my sighting. he say's that he also saw the lights at the same time and the same duration. after this i don't talk about this anymore until today.
content.summary: Flying, pulsated objects who change there order.

content.detailedDescription: My sons girlfriend went to publix. when she returned home she came in yelling "what are those orange lights in the sky?!!" so my son, the girl and myself went outside to see what she was talking about. then we saw them. it was just getting dark but we saw the first one coming through the canopy of trees we were under. then another and another. they all were in formation and when each craft reached a certain point they turned east and all you saw was a flash of the crafts hitting hyper space. so i am wondering if we are the first to ever see a craft hit hyper space? we have photos and we video taped them. and there were people that saw us outside and they came out and saw the same thing we did. since then i have experienced many strange things. and i think i was visited twice by the mib. they didn't say nothing. but when they came close to the house i said pretty much, "ok ok. mums the word". so i'm worried i'll lose my family. and that's not cool because i am going to be a grandfather real soon. but if i can help the world to understand that once the ying a yang tilts the wrong way for too long it will trigger a re-seeding period. again. really. no shit. and i'll send one pix. that's it.
content.summary: 12+ crafts seen by many on our road

content.detailedDescription:
I was siting in my living room writing when my eye was dawn to the blue sky outside my window.  i, at first, saw only blue sky with puffy white clouds here and there but then seeing motion i looked to the northwest, very high in the sky, and saw what at first looked like a jet travelling very fast almost straight down. it had that bright dot.Small orb, of white light that most jets appear like, almost teardrop in shape with the pointing end of the drop behind the rounded part.  it left a trail much like a jet would but it dissapated quite slowly.

something about the trail it left seemed off, can't really explain why, so i continued to watch the moving object and saw it seem to disappear for maybe 7 seconds only to reappear again but a little off from it's original path, a little more west, but still straight down and it disappeared into the cloud below it.

it never came out.

i don't know what the heck that was, possibly stealth of some kind or maybe something else.  i have never seen anything like this just disappear and not come out of a cloud.

i watched for several minutes afterward to see if the small dot of light would come out somewhere around that large cloud but it never did (well that i know of anyways).

just left me with a feeling that this wasn't just a jet.
content.summary: Looked simply like jet plunging straight downward from above a cloud in a blue afternoon sky but upon watching it plunge in blue sky between two clouds disappeared for a short distance. reappeared then into the cloud below but never came out again.

content.altitude: Landed, Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: 3 weeks ago power was out for almost 3 ours. something told me to go out side and take pics and videos for @ least 10 hours a day. started with ufos and stars moving. now they are in my head in my house in the trees grass . abandoned houses next to me. i got a video of monster like aliens , grey aliens and plants breaking into to the house or stealing the electricity not sure yet. they are getting worse . i need help before i hurt my self. have my wife and a few others as witnesses. please help us...  my phones shut down hard to communicate feel trapped in my house and they r sucking my energy out . won't load any videos they r to long says i'm out of data on all 5 phones and ipads
content.features: Dome, Window(s), Patterned Surface, Appendage(s), Other
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: 3 weeks ago power went out for 3 ours . they are in our trailer court. my house, my head, video and pictures by the tons .

content.detailedDescription: The witness in this case received a call from the witness in case 77892 (in dixon, il) concerning lights visible in the northern sky and went out on her back porch to look for them.  two were visible and were heading west, veering up and down a little bit.  a third light appeared and moved into the cloud bank causing it to glow orange-yellow from scattered light.  the 2 witnesses are about 12 miles apart.  the lights disappeared behind a tree in the back yard.  at no time was any noise heard or any faa-mandated lighting visible.
content.summary: Two bright orange-yellow lights seen in the northern sky were traveling west.  a third one appeared and went behind the clouds.

content.detailedDescription: The witness was on the back porch of his home in dixon, il having a cigarette when two very bright lights appeared in the east northeastern sky.  the lights were considerably brighter than the planet jupiter and were silent.  no faa mandated lighting was noticed.  one light was stationary for about 3 seconds, dimmed somewhat and then started moving in a straight path off to the south.
content.summary: 2 bright white star-like lights seen in the ene sky; one hovered and then moved off to the south.  2nd light followed the first one.

content.detailedDescription:
1. it started on saturday night, just over a week ago. it has gotten more apparent. it's in the backyard of our house. 
2. glanced into the backyard and thought it was weird that part of the yard was flattened, but not the whole thing. walked around the surrounding field and there's no other vegetation like it, the rest of the field seems normal, not crushed and flattened.
3. first thing i thought was crop circle, especially after i investigated. it almost looks like cowlick in how it starts and spins outward away from the starting point. but the rest of my yard isn't crushed and flattened the way this 6-like shape is. it takes up about 10-15 feet in diameter.
4. not available, but my dog won't go out back anymore by itself and the birds in the yard don't go near the center of the yard anymore. my 6 year old grandson also feels scared of the backyard, and this did not used to be the case.
5. i was fascinated but not scared, curious. two years ago a weird, random plant showed up in my yard. it didn't look like anything else we've seen in this area of colorado. it used to be in the arm of the 6, we called it an alien plant because it felt so unexplainable. now, there's a weird spiral that's shaped somewhat like a 6 extending from where this plant once lived. i have pictures of the plant if you need it, i need to find them. 
6. the object still shows signs in the backyard. it's not as prominate, the shape, but the plant life is still crushed and now dying.
content.summary: It's a crop circle-like phenominom, shaped like a 6

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were at a hotel on the beach in daytona beach florida on 7/20/16. the hotel is on sr a1a about 2.0 miles south of us 92. the time was 8:52 pm and it had just turned dark.
 
we were sitting in the lawn area overlooking the ocean when we heard several people in a parking lot next to us to the south speaking loudly and pointing to a blinking object in the sky. the object was about ½ mile south of our position, at about a 30–45 degree angle from our position, hovering over the beach at maybe 500’ (?). from our position it looked small maybe about the size of a penny held at arm’s length.
 
it looked like a sphere with a ring around it, kind of like the planet saturn. it had a lot of lights on it many different colors. very bright white/silver, green maybe others, not sure. the white/silver lights were constant and there were others blinking. there was a violet one on the bottom that blinked a lot slower than the others, maybe once every second. the others were faster. 

the object hovered for about a minute that we observed. it then slowly turned west then south arcing slightly as it did. it then headed south slowly then very quickly picked up speed and continued south down the beach until we lost sight of it.

my wife noted there was a small plane approaching the object from the north and when the plane got really close, the object turned and quickly sped away. as my wife said "it hauled butt". 

i had difficulty getting my phone camera to focus in the dark but managed to snap one picture as soon as i saw it, then started video recording for 30 seconds or so. i turned off video so i could snap another picture. when i turned it off the object had started its turn. i turned the video back on until i lost sight of it.

we are not sure what this was. it was definitely not a plane or helicopter. it couldn’t have been a drone as the drone would have to have been a big one, at least 10-15 feet in diameter. no other logical explanation to what we saw.
content.summary: Saturn like object hovering 1 mile away. bright blinking colored lights. hovered then turned south and moved away slowly then very fast.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking down my block with a friend and something told me to look up and that's when i saw this v shape ufo fly pass over my building. i turned to my friend and said did u just see what i saw? and he said to me,shut up we didn't see that.
content.summary: I was walking down my block with a friend and something told me to look up and i saw it fly by with my friend

content.detailedDescription: My wife and 3 year old daughter and myself were watching the iss in the northern sky this morning from our apartment in south ms when a orb appeared from behind a cloud. it was heading towards the iss what seems like just a few seconds when something like lightning shot out from it but it didn't hit the ground like lightning and it didn't travel far like lightning it stayed fairly close to the space station and it had two big lightning bolts with smaller ones coming from the big ones and one went above and the other went below the space station. the orb shot off in a different direction and was gone and the space station continued on like nothing had happened. there was no sound at all and it was over a few seconds after we first noticed the orb. my wife and i look at each other and said did you see that. we were shocked to see something like this happen and we both regret not filming as we had done on previous occasions of watching the iss. i have heard of ball lightning and i know things can appear different from one perspective to the next but we have no idea what this was so i looked on the internet and couldn't find anything. this is when and where it happened. 5:37 to 5:40 july 24 2016 in south mississippi looking at the northern sky about 30 degrees above the horizon.
content.summary: Watching iss then orb appears from behind a cloud and heads toward iss then a flash of lightning comes from it and then it speeds off.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving it was about l0:00 my son said look he showed me a dark object sitting in the sky i saw it, then it was gone. no sound.
content.summary: We were  going down the road, my son saw the object then i did, it lasted a short while then it was gone.

content.detailedDescription: I left my house in north manor texas around 9:58am. right before i got onto fm 973 i noticed a large bright white disk shaped object flying from my far right to south over manor. the object was moving very fast and decending gradually. then it stopped decending and kept moving south over manor. i could see it flying past clouds in and out. the brightness never changed color. it was all white. the shape was oval/ disk. it flew over manor and disappeared south over the hills. about a minute before it disappeared a commercial plane flew over manor going from east to west. the white disk looked and moved nothing like the plane. i have video on my iphone.
content.summary: Bright white disk moving fast then slow, no noise, big and like nothing i've ever seen.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was driving at low speed.
2. i just look tonthe sky normally and i saw it and i was with my mother. we park at the hwy side and take my cellphone tontake pictures. i take 12 pictures fastly but the ufo just appear on 4 of thems. he dissapear between the clouds.
3. inmediatly i saw it i toll my mom and she agree thats was an ufo.
4. he was stationary between the clouds and when i begin to take pictures he take back between the clouds.
5. i was very excited and we keep the car off a lot of minutes and i send the pictures to some familiars and friends and they say the same. this is an ufo !!
6. i dont know why the picture 5/12 was cloudy there i lose the object.On pictures 6 and 7 you can see the object does not appear but the clouds changes has been minimals.
content.summary: The ufo was between the clouds and hidden. was very big with black windows.

content.detailedDescription: I don't know but a plane is missing and naval force satellite etc are trying to find out but can't found and can you help to find that plane an-32 which was going from chennai to portblair and after some 40 minutes the plane was missing.The plane's photo.
content.summary: Don't know

content.detailedDescription:
It was another summer night in bol - island brač in croatia. i was 11 by that time. we were living in a part of city up there where there were few houses and families. sky was not black but very nice dark blue and you can still see some orange warm sky on the horizon. our neighbour starting to yell and we run to see what it is. my father and i was right next to guy. there is also another from other house that used  to have telescope. when he have seen ufo he run for it but he didn't made it so quick. object was glowing and it was on same spot for almost 4 minutes. it was orange and in kind of disc but not so flat one. it has his own light source and there are some slight changes in lights from orange to red on some point of object. we were all excited and i know my dad went crazy he is  huge sci-fi fan. we couldn't move our eyes from object. it was silent and quiet far from our point of view. there are  two mountains and this object was somewhere after first one. but still few miles away. people are saying what is this? doesn't move and it doesn't have that blinking lights as planes or helicopters has. sky was completely clear. still no signs of stars on it. after 3,5 minutes objects starts to move away from us and slightly on right so it went behind mountain. the speed is ascending but i never seen anything so quick ever. in few seconds its gone behind first mountain which is approximetly 500-700m high. the other is 1000m or so. it's highest one in dalmatia islands. while moving away object get some green color in it's structure. colors were mixing like in some 60's psychodelic way. for me as a child it was just wow but my father and buys who were there couldn't sleep all night and were talking about what they have seen all night. 
this is part of my life i will never forget. whatever it is it isn't not human and it was beautiful. peaceful and it looks like it was just observing. 
that was era without cell phones and quick cameras. my dad was photographer but at that moment he was just blessed that this thing is happening in front of his eyes so he didn't think much about making photo of it. everything was so quick.
two decades later i have another ufo sight i will report that one too.
content.summary: After sunset me and few people have seen hovering orange ufo near one of two mountins. it was there 3 minutes than quick ascending away while changing color.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home, saw an object with blue and red lights making impossible movements, twisting, turning, looping, ascending and descending.
i pulled over with the intention of making a video, but the object dove much lower, making a swooshing sound, but no engine noise.
i made a decision to get away, as the area was desolate.
content.summary: Object was making impossible movements.Pulled car over, made a loud swooshing noice.I drove away afap

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking along side a ravine that banks into a man made when it looked like anan part of the pond changed colour from a murky dark brown to crystal clear in the top corner.
after a good look i made out a tear shape craft sitting just above or on the water.
it sat still for as long as i was there, i took 2 pictures with my cell phone.
after which i felt like i was being observed and i walked back home.
content.summary: the silhouette was hovering low above a pond it was translucent, almond shape and difficult to spot

content.detailedDescription: My daughter was outside watering the tree when she noticed a string of lights coming over the house from the south east to north west. possibly from phoenix area to coachella valley area. they appeared to be about as high as a plane (approx. 35,000 ft).  neighbors also noticed and stopped. i came outside as well as my other daughter and observed them moving about and forming several geometric type shapes (4-6)then moving about and moving further up in elevation to where they were no longer visible. they moved around slowly and would disappear for a few seconds then reappear in a shape suchas a hexagon.  it lasted about 15 minutes and they slowly disappeared.  we tried taking cell phone pictures but not much luck. i've never seen anything like this before! it seemed unreal.
content.summary: 4 witnessess observed a line of lights coming from east then headed nw.  after the line they separated more and appeared to make various geometric forms. there were about 15 or 20.  they eventually appeared to fly to a higher elevation and disappear.

content.detailedDescription: I saw a black triangle moving at a walking pace down the street. i was with my wife and 2 sisters and we all saw it. i pulled into some medical offices off the road to observe the object better. the object was see through and made absolutely no sound. it was about 4 car lengths on each of the triangular sides. i could not distinguish the thickness due to it being see through. i floated approx. 75 to 100 ft from the ground because i could see the dome that housed the lights but not the actual craft. it had 2 white lights and a red light.
content.summary: Black triangle moving at a walking pace near af base

content.detailedDescription: Was at a graveyard with some family and was filming the beautiful sky. i don't remember seeing anything unusual until i reviewed the video about a month later and was starting and stopping the video and captured the pictures of what appears to be something odd. thought it was a bird in the video at first until i zoomed in. also, a bird could not have traveled as fast as this thing did. in the video you can hear a clicking sort of sound when it goes by me and i have heard this same clicking sound at other times in other videos.
content.summary: Was visiting graveyard with family and was filming the sky

content.detailedDescription:
My son and i let our dog out tonite for regular routine business. we were marveling at the stars and almost at the same time i noticed it, my son said, "why is that star moving?"  i was at once startled because for the past 5 years or so, i've been keenly aware of the north-south flight path i live under.  planes depart from bwi and new york airports and travel south to destinations along the east coast. i've noted these using the flight aware app.  i'm very familiar with both the bwi flight paths and those into reagan national.   the reason i was so shocked when i saw this (and heard my son's verbal acknowledgement of the same) is because planes never ever go on this path.  sure, maybe in a rare case when they are stacking planes at reagan national but that's usually only in bad weather and more importantly, they do so at less than 10,000 ft. this object was at 25,000 ft or above. i know this based on flight aware data from passing planes. 

i know this is a low value sighting of basically a reddish light in the sky moving along a path. but it was unusual.  additionally, after i shuffled my son to bed, i went back outside to see if anything would return but nothing did...Except a shooting star, traveling northeast. classic streak of light type shooting star. 

anyway, felt i should record this one.
content.summary: Red light traveling north on known southbound commercial flight path.

content.detailedDescription: I've been doing a regular skywatch for some time and had a similarly shaped craft in the same area on july 18, 2016, also reported to mufon. this was not viewable by naked eye, and i watched the meteorite flash across the sky but it wasn't until i reviewed footage, taken with a modified 'ghost'-pro, full-spectrum night vision camera, that i became aware that there was a stationary object, apparently close enough to the meteor's direct path, that it lights the object, or the object becomes visible when meteorite passes in it's path. time and date stamp are correct, but the year should be 2016.
content.summary: Triangle craft appears slightly before and after metorite passing in direct area

content.detailedDescription:
Hi. i am 14 years old and a boy scout of america, rank first class. i was attending the closing ceremony/flag retirement ceremony on friday july 22, 2016. the incident occurred at the curtis s. read scout reservation in brant lake, ny at the buckskin waterfront. it was at 9:40 and during the middle of a skit. the benches were facing almost northwest and the craft came from behind the tall pine trees from the west. the craft was probably 1000 to 2000 ft above the ground. it followed a straight path over the lake, called chub pond, and continued to the east. it was like a rectangular prism, with two levels of windows. probably 4-6 windows a level. near the bottom at the back, there was a small flashing light like a plane. because it was dark, i couldn't make out the edges. it moved slow, 20-30 miles an hour. there was a sound it made. it sounded like how a plane sounds at flying altitude, but it was very close. about ten minutes later, in the direction the craft seemed to be heading, there were many flashes of blue light. it was bright and then got dimmer as time passed. it was strange. in the direction it traveled, there are no houses or roads. the flashing continued until we left.

around 10:15, during the flag retirement ceremony, i saw a really bright light hovering above a nearby mountain. it moved to the right and quickly the light faded and disappeared.
content.summary: Aboy scout camp, whole camp saw ufo and flashes at night at closing campfire ceremony.

content.detailedDescription: After a visit to my cardiologist at the heart hospital.Power and broadway mesa az. i was feeling pretty good about my doctors visit and might i say in a good mood as i was walking back out to the parking lot. the hospital parking is a second floor outside parking deck. walking to the car i looked to the east toward the superstition mountains and noticed a fast moving white object heading my way. this thing was 50 - 60 degrees above the horizon my guess. being curious i kept an eye on this object as i unlocked and opened the car door. it appeared to be sphere shaped, but then again it was hard to judge at that distance, i do know it was bright white and coming in fast. i had several ground references to judge movement and speed (a large tree, and a telephone pole with several lines). as i was looking through the telephone lines the object came closer, it slowed down and eventually stopped. no mistake, i had those lines as a reference. it moved upwards and to the right (south)then stopped. after a few seconds it moved left (north) for some short distance and stopped again. at that time i noticed there were not one but two reflecting spheres very close together. the movements were rapid and precise,,, this is what really captured my attention. resting my cell phone on the door of my car i took several pictures, some zoomed in some at normal setting. the sky was clear and blue at 12:02 pm friday 7/22/16, temperature was a hot 106 degrees. i watched this object for several minutes darting up/down/left/right! since i captured it on my camera i decided to get in the car and head home. as i pulled out onto the street i noticed the object was no longer in sight. a very odd object and very strange behavior indeed. i will share the original untouched photos with  the assigned field investigator and chief investigator.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Small white object moving fast then sudden stop

content.detailedDescription: I was in gainesville, fl leaving a friends with my boyfriend. he was walking in front of me and i was lagging behind. it was a windy night because i turned my head to see the trees move. at that moment that i turned, everything stopped. the trees were still and this ball of light just came out of the night sky. the ball of light stayed looking at me, then made a motion to the right and went back into the night sky-like a door or something was there. once it had left, the trees started to move and my boyfriend was already in the car. for me it felt like 20 seconds went by but in reality it was more since i asked my boyfriend. it left no residue and didn't have any sound. those are the only details that i remember from that night, but i can never forget how still everything became-till this day, it haunts me. whatever i witnessed that night made an impression on me because no matter what, i can never forget what i saw or how i felt. that ball of light felt so close that it seemed that if i were to reach out my hand i would have been able to touch it..But i couldn't move. my boyfriend didn't notice anything and said he was just in the car waiting for me and didn't think to look back. ...It was strange.
content.summary: Ball of light came from the sky. everything stopped. hovered over me, then shifted and went back into the dark. the ball of light felt so close and as if it stayed looking at me .

content.detailedDescription: My wife was enjoying evening on the terrace laying on the beach chair, watching the evening sky. at 22:15 (23rd july, 2016) she called me outside to see something urgently. i rushed outside and observed three triangular shaped object flying in formation from se to nw. in the first moment they looked as military airplanes. but objects were much faster, shape was not of the airplane and lights were not nautical. objects were in reverse triangle formation (two in front one at the back) with steady yellowish light. no blinking lights, no red or green. the triangular shape of objects them self, could be easily seen against lighter sky. there was no sound. the speed was enormous since objects covered whole sky from se to nw in less than a minute! much faster of observed airplanes. the object flew whole sky and disappeared behind city scenery. the phenomenon lasted about 40 seconds. i am astronomer so this was not like any astronomical object. few meteors were observed after this appearance. there was no time to grab a camera or anything to record event. after event, the area is scanned for airplanes on virtual radar (flightradar24 and radarbox) but there was no object flying in such manner.
content.summary: Two witnesses observed three triangle objects with enormous speed, without sound.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was standing outside on a street
2. i look up to the sky, saw a cylindric shaped object, with a grey, metal like refelecting surface
3. i tought of a plane, but it was not moving at all
4. i saw a cylindric shaped object, with a grey, metal like refelecting surface in the sky, surprisingly it was not moving at all
5. i was a kind of insecure and scared because i did not knew what i just saw
6. i look down, because someone was talking to me, as i look back up it was gone
content.summary: Cylinder like shape sighted in the sky on a friday morning not moving

content.detailedDescription:
! we were at tippy dam on the manistee river below the dam fishing at night for walleyes
2, my friend ike saw a green light coming over the trees twards the river/dam
3, a ufo maybe the light was a strange green glow and moving very slow. we have seen strange things there before but this was closer and different could not hear anything due to coffer dam and sound of the water
the green glow until my friends son blinked his flashlight at it then it got super bright lighting up everything then was gone in a flash to the north i think but it was over the parking lot for that side of the river
while watching the green light wondering what it was after the flash of light strange but we packed up at left. when we got to the truck were amazed it was like 3 am i think. i know we both felt it should have not been near that late we really had not been fishing that long. and we got there just before dark.
when it shot out of sight at a high rate of speed
content.summary: My friend mikep. saw a green light slowly coming over trees to river. his son mike shined his flashlight on and off at it then it got real bright lighting up everything then was gone in a flash

content.detailedDescription: I only seen this image after i enlarged it on my phone.  i took it facing the mountains during an incoming storm around july 14th 2016 in fountain, co.
content.summary: Looking out my bedroom window during a incoming storm towards the mountains.  i only seen this image after i enlarged it on my phone.
